generic: Preserve legal mentions in source code
obligations.name: Preserve legal mentions in source code
obligations.verbatim: (1) If any part of the source code for this software is distributed, then this README file must be included, with this copyright and no-warranty notice unaltered;

generic: Reproduce license and legal mentions in documentation
obligations.name: Reproduce license and legal mentions in documentation
obligations.verbatim: (1) If any part of the source code for this software is distributed, then this README file must be included, with this copyright and no-warranty notice unaltered; and any additions, deletions, or changes to the original files must be clearly indicated in accompanying documentation.

generic: Track and mention modifications in the source code
obligations.name: Indicate modifications
obligations.verbatim: any additions, deletions, or changes to the original files must be clearly indicated in accompanying documentation.

generic: Add specific legal mentions in the documentation
obligations.name: Add specific legal mentions in the documentation
obligations.verbatim: (2) If only executable code is distributed, then the accompanying documentation must state that "this software is based in part on the work of the Independent JPEG Group".

generic: Do not use project or contributor names for endorsement or promotion.
obligations.name: Do not use project or contributor names for endorsement or promotion.
obligations.verbatim: Permission is NOT granted for the use of any IJG author's name or company name in advertising or publicity relating to this software or products derived from it. This software may be referred to only as "the Independent JPEG Group's software".
